data.html:
Skip to content

New Stated Income Commercial Loan Program

Stated Income Programs for Commercial property mortgage loans allow our borrowers to avoid the additional paperwork associated with verified income loan programs.Fast approval process and great terms make our stated income commercial loans one of our most popular programs.

[button link=”/contact-us”] Contact Us[/button]

or Call us 877-976-5669

Stated Commercial Property Loan Overview:

[pricing_table]
[pricing price=”” currency=”” title=”Stated Income Highlights” desc=”Commercial Property Loans” moretext=”More” url=”/commercial-loans]
[feature]No Income Verification[/feature]
[feature]Individuals, DBA, Corporation, LLC, Trusts[/feature]
[feature]All Commercial Properties[/feature]
[feature]Commercial Construction[/feature]
[feature]Land Loans[/feature]
[feature]No 4506T Required[/feature]
[feature]Blanket Loans[/feature]
[feature]No Seasoning on Employment[/feature]
[feature]Equity Gifts[/feature]
[feature]Purchase and Refinance[/feature]
[feature]90% CLTV[/feature]
[feature]Appartment Building Loans = 85% LTV[/feature]
[/pricing]
[pricing price=”” currency=”” title=”Stated Income” desc=”Small Commercial” moretext=”More” url=”/commercial-loans] [feature]5+ Units & Mixed-use = 70% LTV[/feature] [feature]Loan Amounts to $5,000,000[/feature] [feature]Purchase, Refinance, Cash Out[/feature] [feature]Debt Service Ratio < 1.20[/feature] [feature]3, 5, 10 year fixed rate[/feature] [feature]30 year amortized[/feature] [feature]FICO 650[/feature] [feature]Automotive Services = 65% LTV[/feature] [feature]Land Purchase Loans = 50% LTV[/feature][feature]Construction Loans = 95% LTC[/feature][feature]Office Building Loans = 65% LTV[/feature][feature]Retail Property Loans = 65% LTV[/feature][/pricing]
[/pricing_table]

[learn_more caption=”Learn More”] Stated income commercial loans are available for many of our programs and can be utilized by borrowers who do not qualify for traditional or conventional portfolio loan programs or borrowers who have been declined by other lenders. Top reasons for acquiring a stated loan include:

  • Unavailable income documentation
  • Simple application requirements
  • Quick loan funding process
  • High net worth
  • High Debt Service Ratios (DSCR)

Why Stated Commercial Loans are Ideal

Stated income commercial loans have underwriting guidelines that are more tolerant of risk. Therefore, you are able to avoid the many restriction that are associated with conventional portfolio commercial lending. Custom Morgage is able to approve and fund commercial loans transactions that may have been declined elsewhere.

Stated Income Loans for Multifamily and Commercial Income Properties

[pricing_table] [pricing price=”” currency=”” title=”Stated Income Loans” desc=”Multi-Family Properties” moretext=”More” url=”/commercial-loans][feature]1 – 4 Units Investor – Nationwide[/feature] [feature]Loan Amounts to $50,000,000[/feature] [feature]Purchase, Refinance, Cash Out[/feature][feature]Debt Service Ratio Min 1.20[/feature][feature]3, 5, 10 year fixed rate[/feature] [feature]30 year amortized[/feature][feature]FICO 650[/feature][feature]70% LTV[/feature][/pricing]
[/pricing_table]

*** Adjustments – WSJ Prime + 4% – 2% yearly max – 6% life cap over start rate

[button link=”/contact-us”] Contact Us[/button]

or Call us 877-976-5669

[/learn_more]

Skip to content

Stated Income Loans |Starting at 4.25%

Our stated income programs are available for self employed borrowers.  We have several different programs for different property types.  The program rates vary and depend on the amount of documentation you are able or willing to provide.  Contact us today to get a free rate quote.

Apply now Contact

Stated income loans are for self employed borrower's and can help borrowers get a mortgage without using tax returns, W2 or paystubs. Because self employed borrowers tend to have many more expenses and deductions then wage earners, their tax returns show much less available income.

Custom Mortgage has many available programs to help self employed borrowers get the mortgages when traditional banks cannot provide them a loan. Our programs include:

BANK STATEMENT PROGRAMS

  • 3 Months Bank Statements
  • 12 Months Bank Statements
  • 24 Months Bank Statements

data.html:
Skip to content

Stated Income Cash Out

One of our most popular programs is our Stated Cash Out owner and non owner occupied loan. Rates as low as 4.25% for residential loans, 1-4 units and rates start at 5.125% for commercial properties such as apartments, industrial properties, retail properties, office properties, gas stations and all other types of commercial properties.

Stated Cash-out programs are very popular because of the simple application process and reduced documentation required to fund the transaction.  Many self employed and wage earning borrowers are ideal candidates for the Stated Income with cash out program.  If you have a strong credit history with many big credit trade-lines and have sufficient equity, we are able to help you fund your next transaction. Whether you need to get the cash out for home improvement, business needs or a vacation, regardless of the use of your funds, you can get the loan.

Apply today and find out how what you qualify for and what the rates will be.

Stated Cash-out programs are very popular because of the simple application process and reduced documentation required to fund the transaction.  Many self employed and wage earning borrowers are ideal candidates for the Stated Income with cash out program.  If you have a strong credit history with many big credit trade-lines and have sufficient equity, we are able to help you fund your next transaction. data.html:
Skip to content

New Stated Income Commercial Loan Program

Stated Income Programs for Commercial property mortgage loans allow our borrowers to avoid the additional paperwork associated with verified income loan programs. The fast approval process and great terms make our Stated Income Commercial Loans one of our most popular programs.

Contact Us

or Call us 877-976-5669

Stated Commercial Property Loan Overview:

Stated Income Highlights

No Income Verification

Individuals, DBA, Corporation, LLC, Trusts

All Commercial Properties

Commercial Construction

Land Loans
No 4506T Required
Blanket Loans
No Seasoning on Employment
Equity Gifts
Purchase and Refinance
90% CLTV
Appartment Building Loans = 85% LTV

Stated Income Small Commercial

5+ Units & Mixed-use = 70% LTV

Stated Income Cash Out

One of our most popular programs is our Stated Cash Out owner and non owner occupied loan. Rates as low as 4.25% for residential loans, 1-4 units and rates start at 5.125% for commercial properties such as apartments, industrial properties, retail properties, office properties, gas stations and all other types of commercial properties.

Stated Cash-out programs are very popular because of the simple application process and reduced documentation required to fund the transaction.  Many self employed and wage earning borrowers are ideal candidates for the Stated Income with cash out program.  If you have a strong credit history with many big credit trade-lines and have sufficient equity, we are able to help you fund your next transaction. Whether you need to get the cash out for home improvement, business needs or a vacation, regardless of the use of your funds, you can get the loan.

Apply today and find out how what you qualify for and what the rates will be.

Skip to content

Financial Privacy Notice

Last Updated: September 1, 2024

At Custom MTG Inc., doing business as Custom Mortgage and Real Estate (“CMRE,” “Company,” “we,” “us,” or “our”), protecting your personal and financial information is of utmost importance. This Financial Privacy Notice explains how we collect, share, and protect your personal information. Please read it carefully to understand our practices.

FACTS

What does Custom MTG Inc. DBA Custom Mortgage and Real Estate (CMRE) do with your personal information?

Why?

Financial companies choose how they share your personal information. Federal law gives consumers the right to limit some, but not all, sharing. Federal law also requires us to inform you how we collect, share, and protect your personal information. This notice will help you understand what we do.

What?

The types of personal information we collect and share depend on the product or service you have with us. This information can include:

  • Social Security number and income
  • Account balances and payment history
  • Credit history and credit scores
  • Employment information and asset details

When you are no longer our customer, we continue to share your information as described in this notice.

How?

All financial companies need to share customers’ personal information to run their everyday business. In the section below, we list the reasons financial companies can share their customers’ personal information; the reasons CMRE chooses to share; and whether you can limit this sharing.

Reasons We Can Share Your Personal Information

Reasons we can share your personal informationDoes CMRE share?Can you limit this sharing?
For our everyday business purposes—such as to process your transactions, maintain your account(s), respond to court orders and legal investigations, or report to credit bureausYesNo
For our marketing purposes—to offer our products and services to youYesNo
For joint marketing with other financial companiesYesNo
For our affiliates’ everyday business purposes—information about your transactions and experiencesYesNo
For our affiliates’ everyday business purposes—information about your creditworthinessYesYes
For our affiliates to market to youYesYes
For non-affiliates to market to youNoWe don’t share

To Limit Our Sharing

If you want to limit our sharing of your personal information:

  • Call us at: 877-976-5669
  • Email us at: info@c-mtg.com
  • Mail the form below

Please note: If you are a new customer, we can begin sharing your information 30 days from the date we sent this notice. When you are no longer our customer, we may continue to share your information as described in this notice. However, you can contact us at any time to limit our sharing.

Questions?

Call 877-976-5669 or visit our website at www.custommortgageinc.com

Who We Are

Who is providing this notice?

Custom MTG Inc. DBA Custom Mortgage and Real Estate (CMRE)

What We Do

How does CMRE protect my personal information?

To protect your personal information from unauthorized access and use, we employ security measures that comply with federal law. These measures include computer safeguards, secured files, and secured buildings.

How does CMRE collect my personal information?

We collect your personal information, for example, when you:

  • Apply for a loan or provide account information
  • Give us your income details or employment history
  • Provide contact information or show your government-issued ID

We also collect your personal information from others, such as credit bureaus, affiliates, or other companies.

Why can’t I limit all sharing?

Federal law gives you the right to limit only:

  • Sharing for affiliates’ everyday business purposes—information about your creditworthiness
  • Affiliates using your information to market to you
  • Sharing for non-affiliates to market to you

State laws and individual companies may give you additional rights to limit sharing.

Definitions

Affiliates

Companies related by common ownership or control. They can be financial and nonfinancial companies.

  • Our affiliates include companies with a common corporate identity, such as subsidiaries and joint ventures.

Non-Affiliates

Companies not related by common ownership or control. They can be financial and nonfinancial companies.

  • CMRE does not share with non-affiliates so they can market to you.

Joint Marketing

A formal agreement between nonaffiliated financial companies that together market financial products or services to you.

  • Our joint marketing partners include mortgage lenders, insurance companies, and other financial service providers.

Other Important Information

California Residents

Under California law, we will not share information we collect about you with non-affiliated third parties, except as permitted by law, such as to process your transactions or maintain your account. We will also limit the sharing of information about you with our affiliates to the extent required by California law.

Vermont Residents

Under Vermont law, we will not share information we collect about you with non-affiliated third parties, except as permitted by law. We will not share information about your creditworthiness with our affiliates except with your authorization.

Mail-In Form

If you have a joint account, your choice(s) will apply to everyone on your account unless you mark below.

[ ] Apply my choices only to me

Mark any/all you want to limit:

[ ] Do not share information about my creditworthiness with your affiliates for their everyday business purposes.

[ ] Do not allow your affiliates to use my personal information to market to me.

Name: __________________________________

Address: ________________________________

City, State, ZIP: __________________________

Account or Loan Number: __________________

Mail to:

Custom MTG Inc. DBA Custom Mortgage and Real Estate (CMRE)
Attn: Privacy Officer
16501 Ventura Blvd, STE 400
Encino, CA 91436

How to Contact Us Regarding Privacy

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at:

  • Phone: 877-976-5669

  • Email: info@c-mtg.com

  • Address:

    Custom MTG Inc. DBA Custom Mortgage and Real Estate (CMRE)
    Attn: Privacy Officer
    16501 Ventura Blvd, STE 400
    Encino, CA 91436

Effective Date: January 1st, 2024

Testimonials
------------

I've been working with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for over five years now, and they've totally helped me get through a bunch of tricky transactions. Their team is super helpful all the way through, making sure everything goes off without a hitch. I seriously recommend Custom Mortgage to anyone who needs financing or a solid real estate broker. They're great at what they do and very dedicated, so they're an awesome pick for any real estate transaction you might need. Save yourself the headache and go with CMRE.

![Rene M Testimonial](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20685%20581'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Rene M

I just worked with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate, and seriously, I can't recommend them enough. They have helped my family and me with a bunch of transactions, always receiving results that nobody else could. Their team is super responsive and really experienced, which made everything go through smoothly with no stress at all. Furthermore, they gave us the best terms out there, making sure we got the most bang for our buck. If you're looking for a reliable mortgage partner, Custom Mortgage is the way to go!

Arthur G

As an investor in real estate and an agent, I totally count on Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for my deals since they've got loads of experience. They have these unique programs that I just can't find anywhere else, and it really gives me an advantage. After researching a number of companies, the offers from Custom Mortgage were the best out there. Knowledgeable and responsive team; in a word, they made everything smooth and efficient. I would definitely recommend them to anyone everyone.

![fereshte kb testimonial](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202269%202005'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

My real estate agent referred me to Custom Mortgage and had nothing but great things to say about them; now I completely understand why. They set me up with a mortgage at an astounding rate of 1.875%, which really blew my mind. The whole process was easy, with them always there to help me out with my questions. Their professionalism and commitment made it all so easy. You should check out Custom Mortgage if you need help with real estate matters; they provide a one of a kind service!

![max val testimonial](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20902%201057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Max V

OMG, as a real estate agent, I have partnered with a lot of lenders, and I can literally say that Custom Mortgage stands above the rest! They have always come through with the best options for my family, my clients, and me whenever we needed a mortgage. Their team knows what they are doing and will get back to you in record time to make everything easy and smooth. Seriously, I recommend Custom Mortgage to all my clients, friends, and family for their mortgage needs! Try a transaction for yourself.

data.html:
Skip to content

Contact Us

In ensuring you get started with us, we make the way you contact us way easy and simple. You can contact us using our fast online customer support chat box, our office address, email or on phone.

We are always ready to help you for any loans.

Call Us

877-976-5669

Email

Please use the contact form to reach us by email

Find Us

16501 Ventura Blvd STE 400, Encino, CA 91436

Live Chat

Live chat can be initiated on the bottom right of the screen

Frequenty Asked Questions

What is Custom Mortgage + Real Estate?

Custom Mortgage + Real Estate is a Nationwide Mortgage Banker and Commercial and Residential Real Estate Broker.  We provide many traditional loan solution and also have unique specialized such as Stated Income loans up to 80% loan to value.

Services Include: Home Mortgages, Hard Money Financing, Commercial Loans, Stated Income, Construction Financing, Loan Modifications, Short Sales, Debt Settlement, Small Business Loan, and SBA.

What kind of loans does Custom Mortgage offer?

We offer Residential and Commercial Loans:

Residential – Conventional, FHA, Hard Money, Land Loan, Reverse Mortgage, Construction Loans, Non QM, and more

Commercial – Conventional, Construction Loans, SBA, Stated Income, DSCR, Hard Money, Fannie/Freddie, and more

The loans programs that are available to you will be specific to the State and Territory that the loan falls under.

If purchasing a property, how can I use Custom Mortgage + Real Estate services?

-You are starting your home inquiry.

-You have a potential home and need to make a proposition.

-You are interested in a loan program.

Contact Us
==========

In ensuring you get started with us, we make the way you contact us way easy and simple. You can contact us using our fast online customer support chat box, our office address, email or on phone.

We are always ready to help you for any [**loans**](https://custommortgageinc.com/home-loans/)
.

### Call Us

877-976-5669

### Email

Please use the contact form to reach us by email

### Find Us

16501 Ventura Blvd STE 400, Encino, CA 91436

### Live Chat

Live chat can be initiated on the bottom right of the screen

   

Name 

Email 

Phone 

Message

Contact us

Frequenty Asked Questions
-------------------------

What is Custom Mortgage + Real Estate?

Custom Mortgage + Real Estate is a Nationwide Mortgage Banker and Commercial and Residential Real Estate Broker.  We provide many traditional loan solution and also have unique specialized such as Stated Income loans up to 80% loan to value.

Services Include: Home Mortgages, Hard Money Financing, Commercial Loans, Stated Income, Construction Financing, Loan Modifications, Short Sales, Debt Settlement, Small Business Loan, and SBA.

What kind of loans does Custom Mortgage offer?

We offer Residential and Commercial Loans:

Residential – Conventional, FHA, Hard Money, Land Loan, Reverse Mortgage, Construction Loans, Non QM, and more

Commercial – Conventional, Construction Loans, SBA, Stated Income, DSCR, Hard Money, Fannie/Freddie, and more

The loans programs that are available to you will be specific to the State and Territory that the loan falls under.

If purchasing a property, how can I use Custom Mortgage + Real Estate services?

\-You are starting your home inquiry.

\-You have a potential home and need to make a proposition.

\-You are interested in a loan program.

HOW OUR PROCESS WORKS

You begin with filling out our online application which usually takes about 15 minutes.

Submit Documents

Submit your loan documents by uploading them after your application such as ID, Bank Statements, Insurance and Income documents.  Once we have these, it usually takes 24-48 hours to get your loan pre approval.

Get Title and Escrow

Once your loan is pre approved, we can order your title and escrow documents to get your loan finalized.  This usually takes about 24 hours after your loan is pre approved.

Get Appraisal

Once we have your loan document, escrow and title documents received, we will order your appraisal which takes about one week to get back depending on your location.

Sign Loan Docs

Upon receipt of your appraisal, we will finalize your loan application and get the loan cleared to close after which is when we will complete the loan documents for you to sign.

Fund you loan!

Afer signed loan docs are received back from the escrow company, we will get your loan proceeds wired to the escrow to disperse to you and you will be done!  Congratulation from the whole CMRE family

About Custom Mortgage and Real Estate

Custom Mortgage is a premier nationwide mortgage provider for commercial and residential properties.

We have a proven team of loan professionals ready to assist you with your next real estate transaction. We are different because we care.

We provide many custom services and solutions in the financial industry

Along with our extensive experience in the field of finance, we are dedicated to providing our clients with the most comprehensive portfolio of financial services to assist in any potential transaction.

We work with borrowers of all types and will ensure you receive the best financial solution and guidance we can provide.

Mortgage Origination

Commercial Financing

Business Financing

Debt
Structuring

Debt
Settlement

Loan update

Call Us (877)-876-5669

Apply Today

Miguel Aguayo

President / Broker
Miguel Aguayo is a distinguished real estate and mortgage brokering professional with over 25 years of experience. His extensive expertise spans both real estate and mortgage brokering, making him a versatile and knowledgeable asset to Custom Mortgage. Miguel’s deep understanding of the industry, combined with his commitment to providing exceptional service, ensures that our clients receive expert guidance and support throughout their financial and real estate transactions.

Sam Tehranchi

Vice President
Sam Tehranchi is a seasoned real estate expert with over 20 years of experience. Throughout his career, he has participated in more than 2,000 closed transactions, showcasing his extensive knowledge and expertise in the field. Sam’s extensive management experience and commitment to excellence have made him a trusted and respected figure in the real estate industry. At Custom Mortgage, he leverages his vast experience to provide exceptional service and insights, ensuring our clients achieve their real estate goals with confidence and success.

Monique Cortez

Chief Operation Officer
Monique Cortez, our Operations Manager, brings a wealth of experience in management and marketing to Custom Mortgage. With her strategic approach and dedication to excellence, Monique ensures our operations run smoothly and efficiently. Her expertise in streamlining processes and enhancing client experiences makes her an invaluable asset to our team. Passionate about delivering top-notch service, Monique is committed to helping our clients navigate their financial journeys with confidence and ease.

Eve Sanchez

Compliance Supervisor
Eve Sanchez has been an integral part of Custom Mortgage for over 10 years, bringing a wealth of experience in mortgage underwriting, processing, and servicing. Her extensive knowledge in various areas of the real estate industry positions her perfectly in our compliance department. Eve’s dedication and expertise ensure that our operations adhere to the highest standards of compliance, providing our clients with reliable and trustworthy service.

Effi Azarmir

Chief Financial Officer
Effi Azarmir has been a vital part of Custom Mortgage for over 8 years, serving as our Chief Financial Officer. With a keen eye for financial management and strategic planning, Effi ensures the financial stability and growth of our company. His expertise and leadership in finance play a crucial role in maintaining the trust and confidence of our clients and stakeholders. Effi’s commitment to excellence drives the financial success of Custom Mortgage, making him an invaluable member of our team.

Schedule A MEETING or call

Fill out the form below, and we will be in touch shortly.
Contact Information
Preferred Date and Time Selection

Testimonials

I've been working with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for over five years now, and they've totally helped me get through a bunch of tricky transactions. Their team is super helpful all the way through, making sure everything goes off without a hitch. I seriously recommend Custom Mortgage to anyone who needs financing or a solid real estate broker. They're great at what they do and very dedicated, so they're an awesome pick for any real estate transaction you might need. Save yourself the headache and go with CMRE.

Rene M

I just worked with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate, and seriously, I can't recommend them enough. They have helped my family and me with a bunch of transactions, always receiving results that nobody else could. Their team is super responsive and really experienced, which made everything go through smoothly with no stress at all. Furthermore, they gave us the best terms out there, making sure we got the most bang for our buck. If you're looking for a reliable mortgage partner, Custom Mortgage is the way to go!

Arthur G

As an investor in real estate and an agent, I totally count on Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for my deals since they've got loads of experience. They have these unique programs that I just can't find anywhere else, and it really gives me an advantage. After researching a number of companies, the offers from Custom Mortgage were the best out there. Knowledgeable and responsive team; in a word, they made everything smooth and efficient. I would definitely recommend them to anyone everyone.

Fereshteh B

My real estate agent referred me to Custom Mortgage and had nothing but great things to say about them; now I completely understand why. They set me up with a mortgage at an astounding rate of 1.875%, which really blew my mind. The whole process was easy, with them always there to help me out with my questions. Their professionalism and commitment made it all so easy. You should check out Custom Mortgage if you need help with real estate matters; they provide a one of a kind service!

Max V

OMG, as a real estate agent, I have partnered with a lot of lenders, and I can literally say that Custom Mortgage stands above the rest! They have always come through with the best options for my family, my clients, and me whenever we needed a mortgage. Their team knows what they are doing and will get back to you in record time to make everything easy and smooth. Seriously, I recommend Custom Mortgage to all my clients, friends, and family for their mortgage needs! Try a transaction for yourself.

Cecilia Q

Testimonials
------------

I've been working with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for over five years now, and they've totally helped me get through a bunch of tricky transactions. Their team is super helpful all the way through, making sure everything goes off without a hitch. I seriously recommend Custom Mortgage to anyone who needs financing or a solid real estate broker. They're great at what they do and very dedicated, so they're an awesome pick for any real estate transaction you might need. Save yourself the headache and go with CMRE.

![Rene M Testimonial](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20685%20581'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Rene M

I just worked with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate, and seriously, I can't recommend them enough. They have helped my family and me with a bunch of transactions, always receiving results that nobody else could. Their team is super responsive and really experienced, which made everything go through smoothly with no stress at all. Furthermore, they gave us the best terms out there, making sure we got the most bang for our buck. If you're looking for a reliable mortgage partner, Custom Mortgage is the way to go!

I would definitely recommend them to anyone everyone.

Their professionalism and commitment made it all so easy. You should check out Custom Mortgage if you need help with real estate matters; they provide a one of a kind service!

Seriously, I recommend Custom Mortgage to all my clients, friends, and family for their mortgage needs! Try a transaction for yourself.
